caption.buildLastChangesNotExported: Changes from the {lastUpdated} have not been exported. They will be lost if your browser data is cleared. Last export on {lastExported}.
caption.buildNotExported: Build not exported. It will be lost if your browser history is cleared.
caption.canOneshot: Can kill in 1 hit to the chest
caption.caption: Caption
caption.cookiesExplanation:
Totov Builder uses cookies only to anonymously detect errors that may occur during your visit.
Accepting cookies is not necessary but greatly helps to improve the website.
caption.copyBuild: Create a copy of the build
caption.ignoredPrice_inPreset: Price ignored because the item is part of a preset
caption.ignoredPrice_notLootable: Price ignored because the item is in a unlootable inventory slot
caption.metaDescription: Totov Builder helps you create weapon builds and choose all of your gear based on merchant levels. View the price and stats of your loadout.
caption.metaTitle: Gun modding and loadout builder for Escape From Tarkov
caption.name: Name

message.armoredItemsRemovedFromApi:
Due to changes to the Tarkov.dev API, presets for armored items that only contain fixed armor slots no longer exist and have been removed from your builds.
For example, the "PACA Soft Armor Default" item which only contains fixed aramid inserts no longer exists, use the "PACA Soft Armor" item instead.
message.armorPenetrationsNotFound: Armor penetrations for item "{id}" not found.
message.battleStateDisclaimer1: Game content and materials are trademarks and copyrights of Battlestate Games and its licensors.
message.buildMigrationErrorNotification: Error while updating build "{buildName}" ({buildId}) from version "{oldVersion}" to "{newVersion}".
message.buildNotFound: Build "{id}" not found. It may have been deleted.
message.buildsNotExported:
Some builds have not been exported.
They will be lost if you clear your browser data or close the browser when in private / incognito mode.
message.buildWithMissingPrice: This build contains an item that is not sold by any of the configured merchants. The price of the build may therefore not reflect reality.
message.cannotAddBodyArmor: Cannot select a body armor because an armored tactical rig has already been added.
message.cannotAddMod: Cannot add mod "{modName}" because it conflicts with item "{conflictingItemName}".
message.cannotAddTacticalRig: Cannot select an armored tactical rig because a body armor has already been added.
message.cannotFindContentItemInPath: Cannot find content item "{itemId}" in path "{path}".
message.cannotFindInventoryItemInInventorySlot: Cannot find inventory item in inventory slot "{inventorySlotTypeId}" at index {index}.
message.cannotFindInventorySlotInPath: Cannot find inventory slot in path "{path}".
message.cannotFindModSlotItemInPath: Cannot find mod slot item "{itemId}" in path "{path}".
message.cannotParseBuildWithoutInventorySlots: Cannot parse reduced build because it has no inventory slots.
message.cannotParseInventoryItemWithoutItemId: Cannot parse inventory item without item ID.
message.cannotParseInventoryModSlotWithoutModSlo: Cannot parse inventory mod slot without mod slot name.
message.cannotParseInventorySlotWithoutItems: Cannot parse inventory slot without items.
message.cannotParseInventorySlotWithoutTypeId: Cannot parse inventory slot without type ID.
message.cannotShareBuildTooLarge: Cannot share build "{name}" by link because it is too large. You can still share it by using the "Export builds to a file" button to export it as a file that can be imported by another person.
message.changelogLoadingError:
Something went wrong while loading the changelog.
Wait a bit and before trying to open it again.
message.fetchMaxTriesError: Failed to successfully request endpoint "{endpoint}" after {maxTries} tries.
message.invalidSharableString:
Error while reading the shared link.
It seems to be corrupted.
message.inventorySlotWithMissingPrice: This inventory slot contains an item that is not sold by any of the configured merchants. The price of the build may therefore not reflect reality.
message.itemCategoriesNotFetched: No item category could be fetched.
message.itemsOfCategoriesNotFound: No items found for the "{ids}" item categories.
message.itemWithMissingPrice: This item (or one of its barter items) is not sold by any of the configured merchants. The price of the build may therefore not reflect reality.
message.noItemsFound: No item could be found for your search with the current merchants and items configuration.
message.postUpdatePeriod:
As we are in a post Tarkov update period, items and prices may not be up to date yet.
They are progressively being updated by the Tarkov.dev team.
message.pricesLoadingError:
Something went wrong while updating prices.
Try waiting a bit and reloading the page.
message.resultCannotReadValueError: Cannot read "value" property of an error result.
message.serviceAlreadyConfigured: Service "{name}" already configured. It has been replaced.
message.shareBuildExplanation: The following link allows another person to get a copy of this build.
message.sharedBuildMigrationErrorNotification: Error while updating build to version "{newVersion}".
message.shareLinkCopyError: Error while copying the share link to clipboard
message.sortingFunctionNotFound: Sorting function for property "{property}" not found.
message.tarkovValuesNotFetched: No Tarkov value could be fetched.
message.websiteConfigurationNotFetched: No website configuration could be fetched.
message.websiteLoadingError:
Something went wrong while loading the website.
Try waiting a bit and reloading the page.
message.welcome3: is a tool for Escape From Tarkov allowing you to create and manage loadouts for your PMCs.
message.welcome4: It features a complete editor allowing to select all the gear you bring in raid and mod your weapons and armors.
message.welcome5: See at a glance the recoil, ergonomics, weight and cost of your weapons and builds.
message.welcome6: Prices are regularly updated in order for you to know exactly how much rubles you loose each time you die !
message.welcomeWarning1: Beware if you are browsing in private / incognito mode !
message.welcomeWarning3: feature in order to save your builds on your disk before closing your browser.
message.welcomeWarning5: You also need to use the
message.welcomeWarning6: feature to manually load them each time you connect to the website.
